original_text: And the wild beasts of the islands shall cry in their desolate houses, and dragons in their pleasant palaces: and her time is near to come, and her days shall not be prolonged.
korean_text: 그의 궁성에는 승냥이가 부르짖을 것이요 화려하던 궁전에는 들개가 울 것이라 그의 때가 가까우며 그의 날이 오래지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: And wild beasts of the islands shall cry
and dragons in their pleasant palaces
and her time is near to come
and her days shall not be prolonged
